title: 2025 Development: Mapping an Optimal Career Path
prompt:
Generate professional, SEO-friendly outlines for articles based on the following details:
            Inputs:
                1.	Topic: [[TOPIC]]
                2.	Main Keywords: [[MAIN_KEYWORDS]]
                3.	Related Keywords: [[RELATED_KEYWORDS]]
                4.	Article Title: [[TITLE]]
                5.	Meta Description: [[META_DESCRIPTION]]
                6.	Language: [[LANG]]
                7.	Tone: [[TONE]]
                8.	Number of Outline: [[NO_OF_OUTLINE]]
            
            [[TOPIC]]
            2025 Development Best Career Path

            [[MAIN_KEYWORDS]]
            2025 Career Development Goals

            [[RELATED_KEYWORDS]]
            High-Demand Skills for 2025,Industry-Specific Career Paths

            [[LANG]]
            English

            [[TITLE]]
            2025 Development: Mapping an Optimal Career Path

            [[META_DESCRIPTION]]
            Explore the latest career trends and secure your future! Learn how 2025 development can help you map out an optimal career path, leveraging high-demand skills and industry-specific expertise.

            [[NO_OF_OUTLINE]]
            3
            
            [[TONE]]
            Select

            The outline should include the following structure:
                • Introduction: Include an engaging opening section summarizing the article and explaining why the content is valuable.
                • H2 Sections: Create multiple H2 subheadings that cover key points, enriched with main keywords and related keywords.
                • H3 Subsections (Optional): Break down H2 sections with detailed points, if necessary, incorporating additional keywords.
                • Conclusion: Summarize the main takeaways and provide a call-to-action or closing insight.

            Keywords Usage:
                • Incorporate main keywords and related keywords naturally across the outline.
                • Ensure SEO best practices by aligning with the target audience’s search intent and readability.
            
            The outline must follow the SEO best practices with a logical structure, optimized for ranking on search engines.

            The output format must strictly follow this structure: [[RESPONSE_FORMAT]]

            [[RESPONSE_FORMAT]]
            {
                "outline": [
                    {
                        "section": "Introduction",
                        "details": "Engaging opening explaining the value of the article."
                    },
                    {
                        "section": "Main Section 1",
                        "details": "Detailed content for the first main section, enriched with relevant keywords."
                    },
                    {
                        "section": "Main Section 2",
                        "details": "Further elaboration on the topic with more actionable advice."
                    },
                    {
                        "section": "Main Section 3",
                        "details": "More in-depth explanation with examples or case studies."
                    },
                    {
                        "section": "Main Section 4",
                        "details": "Final insights or tips for the reader to apply the information."
                    },
                    {
                        "section": "Conclusion",
                        "details": "Summary and final call-to-action."
                    }
                ]
            }
